name: Freezing Runner
description:
It is an interactive novel full of tributes to science fiction writers who have fantasized about nuclear war and cyberpunk since the 1960s.

"I always watched the sky, expecting snow."

In a post-nuclear war underground city, where all things natural are far away, the imagery of snow is filled with memories of the old days and indictments of human wickedness.

It's a short allegorical story that takes place in the future, and I hope players will like it.
